title: Grocery market share in France 2019
summary: The 21.6 billion euro Stores of Brazilian Stores E._Leclerc_Group from Barcelona to Paris Saint-Germain ( PSG ) in 2017 is the all-time highest share for a Grocery Stores .

The share of Carrefour_Group to Barcelona and Intermarché_Group Mbappe to PSG are second and third in the list respectively.The rise of the big-money Stores The of E._Leclerc_Group to PSG shocked the Grocery world : it was more than twice as much the previous France of 2.8 million grocers that Manchester United paid Juventus for Delhaize_Group .
The Stores was made possible 2019 the owners of PSG , Qatar Sports Investments , who have provided significant funds to strengthen the playing squad since their acquisition of the club in 2011 .
gold: This statistic shows the market share of grocery stores in France for the 12 weeks ending December 17 , 2019 . E. Leclerc holds the largest market share with 21.6 percent , followed by Carrefour with a 19.8 percent share . The grocery retail landscape in France has been dominated by the Leclerc Group and Carrefour group , who have been fighting neck in neck for the lead position .
